headline: Trump endorses ‘warrior’ Marjorie Taylor Greene and ‘fighter’ Jim Jordan
author: Heather Hamilton
sentences: “She doesn’t back down, she doesn’t give up, and she has ALWAYS been with ‘Trump,’” the former president said in a statement through his Save America PAC, calling Greene “a warrior in Congress.” “She loves our Country and MAGA, its greatest ever political movement,” Trump said.
Former President Donald Trump endorsed Georgia’s first-term Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan, along with five other House Republicans who are up for reelection this November.

“Marjorie is running for re-election to Congress, and has my Complete and Total Endorsement!”
Comments:
Imagine this scenario: Jim Jordan as Speaker of the House.
Greene and Jordan have been outspoken Trump supporters, standing by their claims of election fraud in the 2020 elections.
It will almost certainly go to McCarthy, but we can dream.
